# subscript(_:)

**Instance Subscript**

Returns a column you select by its name.

## Declaration

```swift
subscript(columnName: String) -> AnyColumnSlice { get }
```

## Parameters

- **columnName**: The name of a column.

## Creating a Slice by Selecting a Column

- **subscript(_:)**: Returns a column you select by its column identifier.
- **subscript(column:_:)**: Returns a column you select by its index.
- **subscript(_:_:)**: Returns a column you select by its name and type.
- **subscript(dynamicMember:)**: Returns a column you select by its name to support dynamic-member lookup.

items.description: Returns a column you select by its column identifier.
items.name: subscript(_:)

items.description: Returns a column you select by its index.
items.name: subscript(column:_:)

items.description: Returns a column you select by its name and type.
items.name: subscript(_:_:)

items.description: Returns a column you select by its name to support dynamic-member lookup.
items.name: subscript(dynamicMember:)
